page.title: 14CHARLBURY STREET FAIR
page.content: The Street Fair is a very popular event in Charlbury.It is held every year with out fail in September. People turn out in great numbers to see the stalls and Morris Dancers. They have different stalls such as Clothes,Cakes,Books,Raffles and Lucky Dips.Sometimes up on the Playing Close they have a Bouncy Castle and Bowls competitions.There are ice-cream and drink stalls.They light up St.Mary's Church and put streamers around the edge and everywhere else.They have a Fun Run during the time the Street Fair is on,which starts at the Bell Hotel and finishes in the back garden behind the Bell Hotel.Adults and children take part and some dress up in fancy costumes.They have floats at the end with different themes each year. Different Societies,Clubs and Streets run them.
